Hey everyone, I hope you're doing well. We currently use the API contacts V1 (unidirectional from our ERP to HubSpot) and we would like to use the latest V5. I tried to find some informations if this is an "easy" change. Do you see any risks ? Can you give me some recommandations / tips for this ?
